original_text: When I go to the world of dead people, all my hope will have finished. Everything that I had hoped for will lie with me in the dust.’ When I go to the world of dead people, all my hope will have finished. Everything that I had hoped for will lie with me in the dust.’ When I go to the world of dead people,
korean_text: 우리가 흙 속에서 쉴 때에는 희망이 스올의 문으로 내려갈 뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: When I go to the world of dead people
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 죽은 자의 세계로 갈 때

sentences.original_text: all my hope will have finished
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 모든 소망은 끝나게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Everything that I had hoped for
will lie with me in the dust
